definition: the trait of being rude and impertinent, to form a crust or form into a crust
details:
noun
- the trait of being rude and impertinent
= synonyms: insolence
- the outer layer of the Earth
- a hard outer layer that covers something
= synonyms: incrustation
verb
- to form a crust or form into a crust
= example: to form a crust or form into a crust
